Roger Hillygus, Appellant,
v.
Kaycee Zusman; and Robin Renae Renwick, Respondents. In the Matter of the Guardianship of the person and Estate of Susan Hillygus, a protected person. Roger Hillygus, Appellant,
v.
Kaycee Zusman; and Robin Renae Renwick, Respondents. No. 75150
No. 75151 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED APRIL 16, 2018

In the MATTER OF the HILLYGUS FAMILY TRUST, Dated August 17, 1993.

DISMISSED.
